title: The Shadows of Destiny
description: What if your destiny held the power to save the worldâ€”or destroy it?In a realm where shadows weave tales of the past, Ravena's existence is shattered when she uncovers a haunting she is caught between two fates. One path illuminates the way to salvation; the other beckons her toward darkness. Discovering her Ruinbound powers, she becomes the target of the merciless King Thorin, a tyrant who hunts those like her with ruthless determination.Forced to flee, Ravena embarks on a perilous journey through the kingdoms in search of answers. Along the way, she uncovers ancient secrets about her lineage and the true extent of her powers. In the midst of danger, she finds allies among the brave rebel groups, faces betrayal, and finds an unexpected love with a daring rebel named Cazien.As the boundaries of good and evil dissolve, Ravena stands at a precipice. Will she wield her powers to rescue her world from impending doom, or will the darkness within her consume everything she holds dear? The choices she makes will echo through the ages, shaping the legacy of her land and its people forever.Shadows of Destiny is a spellbinding tale of courage, love, and the eternal struggle between light and dark.
author: Kaylah Lopez
